attributes.action: make Grime music represent GB at the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long has Great Britain been represented in europe as a country of boring pop music. Britain has one of the greatest underground and original music scenes in the world, It is about time that Britain represents itself as the country it truely is by allowing a Grime Act to represent us at the Eurovision Song Contest.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
